attributes.action: change England's  national anthem to Hubert Parry's - Jerusalem.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that the national anthem for England is changed to Jerusalem.

England does not have an official anthem and for most English people pride fills there hearts when this song is played. The English people need to be able to celebrate England’s culture more and as such St. George’s day should be marked with the playing of this anthem and displaying flags. The English people need to have an identity; every country in Britain can claim God Save the Queen as there second anthem but we have just one. As a result this merges the two; therefore we lose our sense of nationality.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
